content: {"name": "Clinton Chapel AME Zion Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A referral is required to receive a week\u2019s worth of groceries from our pantries. For information on how to get a referral [click here](https://loavesandfishes.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/LFFT-How-to-Get-A-Referral-for-Clients.pdf) or call 704-523-4333. For a printable list of pantries [click here](https://loavesandfishes.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Pantry-Schedule-Bar-Chart-for-Pantries-and-OCHA-Food-Pharmacies-2.pdf).\n", "email": "", "url": "https://loavesandfishes.org/venue/clinton-chapel-a-m-e-zion-church/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1901 Rozzelles Ferry Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Smallwood", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28208", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2424231, "longitude": -80.8606543}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 523-4333", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Inquire about additional food available through TEFAP program; subject to eligibility"}]}
